alert.note: Alert for Adair; Delaware (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 17 at 1:09PM CST until December 19 at 12:22AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tulsa OK has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Illinois River near Watts affecting Adair and Delaware Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Illinois River near Watts. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, minor flooding occurs from the Arkansas border to near Fidler`s Bend. Extreme turbulence makes the river unsafe for floating. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:30 PM CST Friday the stage was 3.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 13.2 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
